parameter.name: last_xmz
parameter.tooltip: File name for last name loaded if any.

parameter.name: Pfreq
parameter.tooltip:
frequency of LFO
lfo frequency = (2^(10*Pfreq)-1)/12 * stretch
true frequency is [0,85.33] Hz

parameter.name: Prandomness
parameter.tooltip: Amplitude Randomness (calculated uniformly at each cycle)

parameter.name: Pfreqrand
parameter.tooltip: Frequency Randomness (calculated uniformly at each cycle)

parameter.tooltip:
Delay before LFO start
0..4 second delay

parameter.name: PfixedfreqET
parameter.tooltip: Equal temeperate control for fixed frequency operation

parameter.name: Prand
parameter.tooltip: Oscilator Phase Randomness: smaller than 0 is "group", larger than 0 is for each harmonic

parameter.name: Pamprandtype
parameter.tooltip: Harmonic random distribution to select from

parameter.name: Pbasefuncpar
parameter.tooltip: Morph between possible base function shapes (e.g. rising sawtooth vs a falling sawtooth)

parameter.name: Pbasefuncmodulation
parameter.tooltip: Modulation applied to Base function spectra

parameter.name: Pwaveshapingfunction
parameter.tooltip: Shape of distortion to be applied

parameter.name: Pfilterbeforews
parameter.tooltip: Filter before waveshaping spectra;When enabled oscilfilter(freqs); then waveshape(freqs);, otherwise waveshape(freqs); then oscilfilter(freqs);

parameter.name: Pharmonicshiftfirst
parameter.tooltip: If harmonics are shifted before waveshaping/filtering

parameter.name: Pprotectthefundamental
parameter.tooltip: Disable resonance filter on first harmonic

parameter.name: PmaxdB
parameter.tooltip: how many dB the signal may be amplified

parameter.name: Pquality.oct
parameter.tooltip: Number of octaves to sample (above the first sample

parameter.tooltip: If all portamentos are proportional to the distance they span

parameter.name: Pnoteon
parameter.tooltip: If the channel accepts note on events

parameter.name: Pkitmode
parameter.tooltip:
Kit mode/enable
Off        - Only the first kit is ever utilized
Multi-kit  - Every applicable kit is run for a note
Single-kit - The first applicable kit is run for a given note

parameter.name: Pdrummode
parameter.tooltip:
Drum mode enable
When drum mode is enabled all keys are mapped to 12tET and legato is disabled

parameter.name: polyType
parameter.tooltip:
Synthesis polyphony type
Polyphonic - Each note is played independently
Monophonic - A single note is played at a time with envelopes resetting between notes
Legato     - A single note is played at a time without envelopes resetting between notes
